      com.liferay.portal.kernel.search.Hits searchCommitments(java.lang.String keywords, java.util.List<java.lang.Long> categoryIds, java.lang.String language, java.lang.Integer start, java.lang.Integer end, java.lang.Long creatorUserId, java.lang.String organization, CommitmentSort sort)
      Search commitments Search approved articles which structurekey is @see Constants.GLOBAL_COMMITMENT_DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY, from company @see Constants.COMPANY_ID and group @see Constants.SITOUMUS2050_GROUP_ID If sort is not provided results are sorted by create date Given categoryIds will be automatically transferred to different logical search terms.

      Updates commitment, Commitment has to have id and version.

      • createCommitment

        public com.liferay.journal.model.JournalArticle createCommitment(Commitment commitment,
                                                                 int workflowAction,
                                                                 boolean autoArticleId)
                                                          throws com.liferay.portal.kernel.exception.PortalException
        Description copied from interface: CommitmentService
        Creates a new commitment. If commitment id is give, tries to create new commitment, if id is already taken throws PortalException. Commitment id can be null. Liferay will create it automatically. Version will be always 1.0 for new commitments
        Specified by:
        createCommitment in interface CommitmentService
        Parameters:
        commitment - commitment commitment
        workflowAction - Liferay's workflow id @see WorkflowConstants
        autoArticleId - if true liferay create articleId automatically
        Returns:
        JournalArticle (Liferay's generic presentation of Commitment) @see JournalArticle
        Throws:
        com.liferay.portal.kernel.exception.PortalException - @see PortalException

      • updateCommitment

        public com.liferay.journal.model.JournalArticle updateCommitment(Commitment commitment,
                                                                 int workflowAction)
                                                          throws com.liferay.portal.kernel.exception.PortalException
        Description copied from interface: CommitmentService
        Updates commitment, Commitment has to have id and version. Version number should match to existing newest version. Liferay will increase version automatically.
        Specified by:
        updateCommitment in interface CommitmentService
        Parameters:
        commitment - commitment
        workflowAction - Liferay's workflow id @see WorkflowConstants

                                                                                        boolean autoArticleId)
                                                                                 throws com.liferay.portal.kernel.exception.PortalException
        Description copied from interface: CommitmentService

        Description copied from interface: CommitmentService

        Specified by:

      • searchCommitments

        public com.liferay.portal.kernel.search.Hits searchCommitments(java.lang.String keywords,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.Long> categoryIds,
                                                               java.lang.String language,
                                                               java.lang.Integer start,
                                                               java.lang.Integer end,
                                                               java.lang.Long creatorUserId,
                                                               java.lang.String organization,
                                                               CommitmentSort sort)
                                                        throws com.liferay.portal.kernel.search.SearchException
        Description copied from interface: CommitmentService
        Search commitments Search approved articles which structurekey is @see Constants.GLOBAL_COMMITMENT_DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY, from company @see Constants.COMPANY_ID and group @see Constants.SITOUMUS2050_GROUP_ID If sort is not provided results are sorted by create date Given categoryIds will be automatically transferred to different logical search terms.
        Specified by:
        searchCommitments in interface CommitmentService
        Parameters:
        keywords - search string
        categoryIds - list of categoryIds
        language - language
        start - start index (pagination)
        end - end index (pagination)
        creatorUserId - creator user id. Note, search target field is article's expando field "creatorUserId"
        organization - organization name. Note, search target field article's expando field "Organization name"
        sort - sort order, @see CommitmentSort, if null then default sort order is by create date
        Returns:
        Hits of commitments which match to terms. Hits are Liferay presentation of search results, which can be read and converted to articles/commitments if needed. However, that would be time consuming so raw hits.toList data is adviced to use in most cases...
        Throws:
        com.liferay.portal.kernel.search.SearchException - @see SearchException

      • addCommitmentImageToDocumentLibrary

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        com.liferay.portal.kernel.exception.PortalException - @see PortalException
